data.title: David Parks
data.meta_description: David is a Director with nearly two decades of ERP, advisory and accounting experience with clients. His client portfolio ranges from small and midsize businesses, to large, public, multinational companies. He specializes in connecting real world commercial, corporate and operational activities with ERP processing. He focuses on establishing simple, efficient business processes for end users while also ensuring his clients’ management teams have reliable and accurate data to drive informed organizational decisions.  Before joining Accordion, David spent the last decade leading complex SAP and Oracle NetSuite ERP implementations across a variety of clients in the software, technology and services sectors. He has also served in program manager capacities, driving multiple workstreams and application integrations for multi-national clients, as well as for private equity and private equity portfolio companies.  David started his career with the French oil supermajor TotalEnergies’ Downstream Accounting team where he was responsible for performing end-to-end operational accounting activities for a variety of crude oil and finished products. Later with DXC Technology, he tackled ASC 605 accounting in depth as a revenue accountant. This experience led David to a spot as a revenue specialist on an SAP implementation project. This work fueled his passion for service and delivery where he soon found his consulting skills take flight.  David graduated with honors from Texas A&M University – Corpus Christi with a B.B.A. in accounting and holds multiple NetSuite certifications, including ERP Consultant and Financial User.
data.text:
David is a Director with nearly two decades of ERP, advisory and accounting experience with clients. His client portfolio ranges from small and midsize businesses, to large, public, multinational companies. He specializes in connecting real world commercial, corporate and operational activities with ERP processing. He focuses on establishing simple, efficient business processes for end users while also ensuring his clients’ management teams have reliable and accurate data to drive informed organizational decisions.

Before joining Accordion, David spent the last decade leading complex SAP and Oracle NetSuite ERP implementations across a variety of clients in the software, technology and services sectors. He has also served in program manager capacities, driving multiple workstreams and application integrations for multi-national clients, as well as for private equity and private equity portfolio companies.

David started his career with the French oil supermajor TotalEnergies’ Downstream Accounting team where he was responsible for performing end-to-end operational accounting activities for a variety of crude oil and finished products. Later with DXC Technology, he tackled ASC 605 accounting in depth as a revenue accountant. This experience led David to a spot as a revenue specialist on an SAP implementation project. This work fueled his passion for service and delivery where he soon found his consulting skills take flight.

David graduated with honors from Texas A&M University – Corpus Christi with a B.B.A. in accounting and holds multiple NetSuite certifications, including ERP Consultant and Financial User.
